definition: Ayurveda (ancient Indian system and health care philosophy)/also written 阿育吠陀[a1 yu4 fei4 tuo2]
Ayurveda (ancient Indian system and health care philosophy)

sentences.english: Turmeric and sweet basil are commonly used Ayurvedic herbs.
sentences.chinese: 姜黄和罗勒都是常用的阿育吠陀草药。

sentences.english: It is also said in the Vedas that Brahman is beyond mind and words.
sentences.chinese: 《吠陀经》也说梵天超越思想和语言。

sentences.english: The Vedic calendar is based on cosmic cycles, or Yugas.
sentences.chinese: 吠陀历法是建立在宇宙周期，或者说是年代之上。

sentences.english: A hymn is also dedicated to him alone in Rig Veda.
sentences.chinese: 利俱吠陀也有一首独一无二献身于他的诗。

sentences.english: Greek myths, as well as the fables of Aesop , inherited them from the Vedas and Buddhism;
sentences.chinese: 希腊神话和伊索寓言是从吠陀经和佛教传袭下来的。

sentences.english: Does it not impair the credibility of the Vedas?
sentences.chinese: 这是否会损害吠陀经的可靠性？

sentences.english: In Ayurvedic medicine, Tamarind is thought to be the most powerful moisturizing agent.
sentences.chinese: 在阿育吠陀医学，罗望子被认为是最强大的保湿剂。

sentences.english: Ayurveda can shed light on the practice of yoga.
sentences.chinese: 阿育吠陀让瑜伽练习散发光芒。

sentences.english: The Vedas are a vast body of jnana, knowledge, for the attainment of spiritual awakening.
sentences.chinese: 吠陀经包含了无限的知识，可以唤醒灵性。

sentences.english: So, what happened is that people thought therefore the Rg Veda cannot be talking about India.
sentences.chinese: 所以，人们认为梨俱吠陀不可能是谈论印度。

sentences.english: Vedic Mantras are chanted according to the intonation given in the Vedas.
sentences.chinese: 吠陀颂歌是根据《吠陀经》中给出的语调唱诵的。

sentences.english: Vedic Mantras are chanted according to the intonation given in the Vedas.
sentences.chinese: 吠陀颂歌是根据《吠陀经》中给出的语调唱诵的。

sentences.english: The classic Sanskrit literature flourished on the basis of the Vedic and Epic literature.
sentences.chinese: 梵语古典文学是在吠陀和史诗的基础上发展起来的。

sentences.english: The main objective of the Purva ("earlier") Mimamsa school was to establish the authority of the Vedas.
sentences.chinese: 弥曼差派的早期主要目标是建立吠陀的权威。

sentences.english: I am a full-time yoga teacher and Ayurvedic wellness counselor.
sentences.chinese: 我是全职瑜伽老师和阿输吠陀养生指导师。

sentences.english: Yoga originated from the Vedic culture, which is pre-Hindu.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽源于吠陀文化，是印度教的前生。
